p1: Stay calm and check if anyone is injured.
p2: Jot down the current time and date of the accident.

p1: Details to capture at the scene:
p2: - Visible damage to vehicle (yours and other party's) - entire vehicle.
p3: - Visible damage to vehicle (yours and other party's) - close up.
p4: - Physical marks on surroundings e.g. skid marks, damaged lamp post, potholes.
p6: - If you have a dashboard camera, save the video footage.

p1: Details to exchange with the other driver:
Call your insurance agent or insurance company.
Lodge a police report at your nearest police station within 24 hours.
